```lisp
(:action select
    :parameters (?p - player ?item - object ?loc - location)
    :precondition (and 
        (at ?p ?loc)
        (or 
            (and (unselected ?loc) (in_garden ?item))
            (and (in_cabinet ?item) (empty ?item))
            (in_bag ?item)
        )
    )
    :effect (and 
        (or 
            (and (selected ?loc) (in_hand ?p ?item) (not (in_garden ?item)))
        )
    )
)

(:action water_plant
    :parameters (?p - player ?plant - fir ?container - container ?water - water)
    :precondition (and (in_container ?plant ?container) (dry ?plant))
    :effect (and (wet ?plant) (not (dry ?plant)))
)

(:action water
    :parameters (?agent - player ?target - object ?container - container ?resource - resource)
    :precondition (and (in_container ?target ?container) (dry ?target) (available ?resource))
    :effect (and (wet ?target) (not (dry ?target)))
)

(:action plant
    :parameters (?agent - player ?plant - plant ?container - container ?soil - soil)
    :precondition (and (in_hand ?agent ?plant) (in_container ?agent ?soil) (empty ?container))
    :effect (and (in_container ?plant ?container) (not (in_hand ?agent ?plant)))
)

(:action repot
    :parameters (?agent - player ?entity - object ?from - container ?to - container)
    :precondition (and (in_container ?entity ?from) (empty ?to))
    :effect (and (in_container ?entity ?to) (not (in_container ?entity ?from)))
)

(:action garden
    :parameters (?agent - player ?entity - object ?resource - object)
    :precondition (and (available ?agent) (not (utilized ?resource)))
    :effect (utilized ?resource)
)
```
